subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn won her ninth career World Cup downhill, Saturday in Sestriere, Italy, matching the American record set by Picabo Street and Daron Rahlves.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn won her ninth career World Cup downhill, Saturday in Sestriere, Italy, matching the American record set by Picabo Street and Daron Rahlves.
